data.title: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela died of cancer last Tuesday, at 58, in the city of Caracas. His remains were taken from the hospital in which he died to the city’s military academy in a seven-hour
data.meta_description:
President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela died of cancer last Tuesday, at 58, in the city of Caracas. His remains were taken from the hospital in which he died to the city’s military academy in a seven-hour long procession.
	
	Photo: Juan Víctor Fajardo
data.text:
President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela died of cancer last Tuesday, at 58, in the city of Caracas. His remains were taken from the hospital in which he died to the city’s military academy in a seven-hour long procession.

Photo: Juan Víctor Fajardo
